biography_text: WALTZ, Michael, a Representative from Florida; born in Boynton Beach, Palm Beach County, Fla., January 31, 1974; graduated from Stanton High School, Jacksonville, Fla., 1992; B.A., Virginia Military Institute, Lexington, Va., 1996; United States Army, 1996-2017; United States Army Reserves, 2017-present; staff, Office of the Vice President Richard B. Cheney, 2007-2009; government contractor; television commentator; author; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
place_of_birth: Boynton Beach, Palm Beach County, Fla.
